headline: A Look At Freeport-McMoRan (FCX) Valuation As Media Interest In Copper And Gold Leader Grows
summary: Recent commentary from Jim Cramer and ClearBridge Investments has put Freeport-McMoRan (FCX) back in focus, as both highlight its role as a major copper and gold producer and emphasize management quality and asset strength. See our latest analysis for Freeport-McMoRan. The latest share price of US$60.07 sits against a 30 day share price return of 22.22% and a 90 day share price return of 47.30%, while the 1 year total shareholder return of 51.13% and 5 year total shareholder return of 138.22%...

headline: Gold Surges Over $4,800 to New High. Why It’s Leaving Silver Behind.
summary: Continuous gold futures  are up by 2%, climbing to $4,862.3 in early trading.  President Donald Trump will arrive in Davos later today for a showdown with European leaders, as his bid to seize Greenland threatens to tear the longstanding trans-Atlantic relationship apart.  For Mathieu Racheter, head of equity strategy research at Julius Baer, global markets have negatively “reacted to a fresh round of tariff rhetoric from Donald Trump targeting several European countries, accompanied by increasingly confrontational messaging.”
